name: rapida
description: NPM packages for creating single-player and multi-player web-based games.

scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd ../packages/rapida-physics && npm i" "cd ../packages/rapida-common && npm i" "cd ../packages/rapida && npm i" "cd ../packages/rapida-server && npm i"
scripts.build: (cd ../packages/rapida-common && npm run build) && (cd ../packages/rapida-physics && npm run build) && concurrently "cd ../packages/rapida && npm run build" "cd ../packages/rapida-server && npm run build"
